ISSUE.TITLE: Missing jquery-migrate file
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 Steps to reproduce the problem: >The setting "JqueryMigrateScriptLoggingActive" defaults to false. When set to true, the file _Root.Head will swap out the working minified file, for a file that does not seem to exist in a fresh installation: ```c# if (commonSettings.JqueryMigrateScriptLoggingActive) { NopHtml.AppendScriptParts(ResourceLocation.Footer, "~/lib_npm/jquery-migrate/jquery-migrate.js"); } else { NopHtml.AppendScriptParts(ResourceLocation.Footer, "~/lib_npm/jquery-migrate/jquery-migrate.min.js"); } ``` >In my relatively new installation of Nop 4.7, file "jquery-migrate.min.js" exists, and file "jquery-migrate.js" does not. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/100582/setting-jquerymigratescriptloggingactive-breaks-nop-47-when-true

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7305 AmazonPay plugin. Fixed building on Linux
